mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_pwd, member_name, member_birth, member_address, member_email, member_phone) values (seq_member, #{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_name}, #{member_birth}, #{member_address}, #{member_email}, #{member_phone})
mapper.update: update member set member_id = #{member_id}, member_pwd = #{member_pwd}, member_name = #{member_name}, member_birth = #{member_birth}, member_address = #{member_address}, member_email = #{member_email}, member_phone = #{member_phone}, where member_number = #{member_number}
